attributes.action: legislate to ensure spares can be obtained at a reasonable price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is currently often cheaper to replace am item rather than repair it as spares are priced at a ridiculous level. I recently found an instance where replacement hinges for a toilet seat cost more than a new seat. This situation results in waste as items are discarded unnecessarily, often into landfill. Legislation is required to stop this happening.
